languages.text: "Благодарю вас за предложение, но я вынужден отказаться. Боюсь, что мой долг перед Золотым Троном превыше всего".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю вас за предложение, но я вынужден отказаться. Боюсь, что мой долг перед Золотым Троном превыше всего".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю вас за предложение, но я вынужден отказаться. Боюсь, что мой долг перед Золотым Троном превыше всего".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the for the offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty before the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the for the offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty before the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty before the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

languages.text: « Je vous remercie pour votre offre, mais je dois refuser. Je crains que mes devoirs envers le Trône d'Or passent avant tout. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous remercie pour votre offre, mais je dois refuser. Je crains que mes devoirs envers le Trône d'Or passent avant tout. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “感谢邀请，但我不得不拒绝。我对黄金王座的职责，恐怕必须高于一切。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: “感谢邀请，但我不得不拒绝。我对黄金王座的职责，恐怕必须高于一切。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für Euer Angebot, doch ich muss ablehnen. Ich fürchte, meine Pflicht dem Goldenen Thron gegenüber steht über allem anderen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Euer Angebot, doch ich muss ablehnen. Ich fürchte, meine Pflicht dem Goldenen Thron gegenüber steht über allem anderen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por su oferta, pero debo rechazarla. Me temo que mi deber para con el Trono Dorado está por encima de cualquier otro asunto».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por su oferta, pero debo rechazarla. Me temo que mi deber para con el Trono Dorado está por encima de cualquier otro asunto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「誘いは嬉しいが、断らないといけないな。残念だが、黄金の玉座の御前の我が務めが何より優先なんだ」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: 「誘いは嬉しいが、断らないといけないな。残念だが、黄金の玉座の御前の我が務めが何より優先なんだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Teklifin için teşekkürler ama reddetmek durumundayım. Ne yazık ki Altın Taht'a olan vazifem, her şeyden önce geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your offer, but I must decline. I am afraid my duty to the Golden Throne comes before everything else."

traits.locale_text: "Teklifin için teşekkürler ama reddetmek durumundayım. Korkarım Altın Taht'a karşı olan vazifem diğer her şeyin önünde geliyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
